abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers beat New Jersey Devils, 6-3; other hockey news noted.

headline.print_headline: Flyers Halt Devils’ Streak; Capitals Rally to Defeat Kings

snippet: Wayne Simmonds and Nick Cousins scored 50 seconds apart in a four-goal third period, and Philadelphia beat the Devils, who had won three straight.
lead_paragraph: Wayne Simmonds and Nick Cousins scored 50 seconds apart in a four-goal third period, and Philadelphia beat the Devils, who had won three straight.
